subject: Re: Radio Shack Hacks (12-469 & 12-470)
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
I with Rosemary, I like my version of the Mini box better, but I 
think it's just because the sweep is adjustable, so the words and 
messages are closer together. I'm not finding much difference between 
my boxes, and the Mini Box though. 


 Frank-S


--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "M.A. Coletta (Mike)" 
<michaelcoletta@...> wrote:
>
> For those of you new visitors who may be joining us from a link on 
the 
> c2c website, here is some information about the Radio Shack hacks 
you 
> may be interested in.
> 
> 12-469 & 12-470 "Ghost Box" type functionality modifications (For
> sweeping band raw audio output)
> 
> A Video on how to modify the RS 12-469 radio:
> http://www.ufogeek.com/12-469mod.wmv
> 
> A Video on how to modify the RS 12-470 radio:
> http://www.ufogeek.com/12-470mod.wmv
> 
> A Video of a practical use of the modified 12-469:
> Part 1: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HH_9MdJdRzo
> Part 2: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=unVPgqoBhx8
> 
> A more detailed, step-by-step video of practical use of the hacked 
12-
> 469:
